description: Calculates correlation coefficients between two 4D datasets using space+time patterns

insetB.title: Input data set B
insetB.description: Second 4D data set. Must have the same spatial dimensions and number of time points as insetA.

mask.title: Mask file
mask.description: Optional mask for calculations. Recommended for speed and interpretability.

out_Zcorr.title: Output Z-transformed correlation
out_Zcorr.description: Switch to output Fisher Z transform of spatial map correlation instead of Pearson r values.

freeze_insetA_ijk.title: Freeze insetA ijk indices
freeze_insetA_ijk.description: Freeze the seed voxel location in the insetA data set using ijk indices while the seed location in insetB moves throughout the volume or mask. Provide three ijk values.

freeze_insetA_xyz.title: Freeze insetA xyz coordinates
freeze_insetA_xyz.description: Freeze the seed voxel location in the insetA data set using xyz coordinates while the seed location in insetB moves throughout the volume or mask. Provide three xyz values.
